title: Bloomberg Markets: Market Drivers, Eco Brief for July 12
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Market Drivers, Eco Brief for July 12
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Carl J Riccadonna Chief US Economist Bloomberg Intelligence Discussing the economy and markets with Bloomberg Stocks Markets Reporter Dani Burger. Dani also discusses "Momentum Is Rising From the Dead, But Only for Equity Quants."

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
